column4: I need some help with screen resolution on a laptop... no matter what I set in xorg.conf, it seems to default to 800x600 and 'Screen Resolution' in the preferences menu only lists 800x600...
looks like you might only have that one available to you
Kitty_: I actually had it working fine before, I tried to get an external monitor working, which failed, and also caused this
I've tried dpkg-reconfigure xserver-org as well, to no effect
